library(tidyverse)

## Table of Contents

```{r icontibble, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
faread <-  as.character(fa("book", fill = "#739670", height = "17px"))
fadc <-  as.character(fa("chalkboard", fill = "#764874", height = "17px"))
faexample <-  as.character(fa("lightbulb", fill = "#eb7b59", height = "17px"))
fatask <- as.character(fa("tasks", fill = "#cf4647", height = "17px"))
fadue <- as.character(fa("folder-open", fill = "#2a6e84", height = "17px"))

tableofcontent <- tibble(
  
  type <- c("Readings", 
            "DataCamp",
            "Examples",
            "Tasks",
            "Due"),
  
  location <- c("[Go](/readings/)",
                "[Go](/datacamp/)",
                "[Go](/example/)",
                "[Go](/tasks/)",
                "[Go](/due/)"),
  
  icon <- c(faread,
            fadc,
            faexample,
            fatask,
            fadue),
  
  descr <- c("This page contains the readings for the topic which should be the first place you go to.",
             "This space includes possible interactive lessons, slides, and/or walkthroughs that help with the content.",
             "Extra items that are picked or created to help you understand the current material exist here.",
             "Instructions for all student related tasks including information about the tasks and deliverables are provided in this location.",
             "This page contains instructions on what to submit by on a weekly basis."
             ),
  
  .name_repair = "minimal"

  ) 
```

<center>
```{r, echo=FALSE}
tableofcontent %>%
  kbl(col.names = NULL, 
      "html", 
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'lccl') %>%
  column_spec(1, 
              bold = TRUE)
```
</center>
